2: One day in 2022... The Devil placed a curse
on the princess of the peaceful kingdom...
The curse placed upon the Princess was a very terrible one
A curse that gradually transforms one into a monster...!
The Hero seeks the sage's advice to break the Princess's curse,
And so the sage explains to him...:
"Legend has it that there is a tree that only grows
at the top of the Mt. [Legendary]..."
"And it is said that the fruit of that legendary tree

is a key ingredient in a rare medicine
that can dispel any curse..."
"But if there was such a thing, I would have quit
this job, raised it and gotten rich...\.\. Hey, are you listening to me?"

After hearing sage's words,
the hero realized that Mt. [Legendary]
was behind the castle, and so hero marched on...
To his surprise, he found there
a sapling of the legendary tree...
